name: TOSO
description:
TOSO is small Prototype I made that was originally supposed to be a Open World Survival game starring Blimblo!

The current fate of this project is unknown and I may continue working on it in the future if anyone is interested in that.

Controls;

W A S D - Movement relative to which way you’re facing

Q E - Turn Left and Right respectively

Space - Move Up

Shift + Space - Move Down
